mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no, b.user_no, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.register_time, u.user_nickname FROM board b LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user_no = u.user_no ORDER BY b.board_no ASC LIMIT #{start}, #{listsize}

SELECT b.board_no, b.user_no, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.register_time, u.user_nickname, a.attachment_id, a.file_name, a.file_size, a.file_type, a.file_path, a.created_at FROM board b LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user_no = u.user_no LEFT JOIN attachments a ON b.board_no = a.board_no WHERE b.board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attachments (board_no, file_name, file_size, file_type, file_path, created_at) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, #{filePath}, NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT attachment_id as attachmentId, board_no as boardNo, file_name as fileName, file_size as fileSize, file_type as fileType, file_path as filePath, created_at as createdAt FROM attachments WHERE attachment_id = #{attachmentId}

SELECT attachment_id as attachmentId, board_no as boardNo, file_name as fileName, file_size as fileSize, file_type as fileType, file_path as filePath, created_at as createdAt FROM attachments WHERE file_path = #{filePath}
